addController(address).details: Add an address allowed to control this contract

allNFTGemPools(uint256).details: get the quantized token for this

createCustomNFTGemPool(bytes,string,stri.details: deploy a new erc20 token using create2

createNFTGemPool(string,string,uint256,u.details: deploy a new erc20 token using create2

relinquishControl().details: Check if this address is a controller

removeGemPool(uint256).details: remove a gem pool from the list using its symbol hash

removeGemPoolAt(uint256).details: remove a gem pool from the list using its index into pools array
